statements.chinese: 我不可以单独做这件事
statements.english: I can not do it alone

statements.chinese: 你必须帮助我因为我不可以单独做这件事
statements.english: you have to help me because I can not do it alone
I can not be here tomorrow

statements.chinese: 他需要知道是否我可以明天在这里
statements.english: he needs to know if I can be here tomorrow

statements.english: I can eat the food now

statements.english: I can not eat the food now

statements.english: I want to know if I can eat the food now

statements.english: I need to know if you can help me
you can not read at home
you need to tell me the reason

statements.chinese: 你需要告诉我原因为什么你不可以在家里阅读
statements.english: you need to tell me the reason why you can not read at home

statements.chinese: 他不可以以后做这件事
statements.english: he can not do it later

she can ask me a question

statements.english: I will tell you the truth in the future

statements.chinese: 我将不会在未来告诉你事实
statements.english: I will not tell you the truth in the future

statements.chinese: 它是不重要的所以我将会在未来告诉你事实
statements.english: it is not important so I will tell you the truth in the future

statements.chinese: 我将会在下周解释原因
statements.english: I will explain the reason next week

statements.chinese: 我将不会在下周解释原因
statements.english: I will not explain the reason next week
